(inv_qty('Dragonfruit') < (6 * (inv_qty('Redwood seed') + inv_qty('Redwood seedling') + inv_qty('Redwood sapling'))) ? '<col=FF4D4D>Payment: 6 (' + (6 * (inv_qty('Redwood seed') + inv_qty('Redwood seedling') + inv_qty('Redwood sapling'))) + ') Dragonfruit</col>' : '<col=55ff55>Payment: 6 (' + (6 * (inv_qty('Redwood seed') + inv_qty('Redwood seedling') + inv_qty('Redwood sapling'))) + ') Dragonfruit</col>') : (inv_qty('Dragonfruit') < 6 ? '<col=FF4D4D>Payment: 6x Dragonfruit</col>' : '<col=55ff55>Payment: 6x Dragonfruit</col>')}

${'<col=FFFF66>Experience: 22,450' + ((inv_qty('Redwood seed') + inv_qty('Redwood seedling') + inv_qty('Redwood sapling')) > 1 ? ' (' + (((inv_qty('Redwood seed') + inv_qty('Redwood seedling') + inv_qty('Redwood sapling')) * 22450) < 1000000 ? floor(((inv_qty('Redwood seed') + inv_qty('Redwood seedling') + inv_qty('Redwood sapling')) * 22450) / 1000) + 'k' : floor(((inv_qty('Redwood seed') + inv_qty('Redwood seedling') + inv_qty('Redwood sapling')) * 22450) / 1000000) + 'm') + ')' : '') + '</col>'}

hovers.condition: inv_contains('Spirit seed') || inv_contains('Spirit seedling') || inv_contains('Spirit sapling')
hovers: ${(inv_qty('Monkey nuts') < 5 || inv_qty('Monkey bar') < 1 || inv_qty('Ground tooth') < 1) ? '<col=FF4D4D>Payment: 5x Monkey Nuts, 1x Monkey Bar, 1x Ground Tooth</col>' : '<col=55ff55>Payment: 5x Monkey Nuts, 1x Monkey Bar, 1x Ground Tooth</col>'}

${inv_qty('Potato seed') > 1 ? (inv_qty('Compost') < (2 * inv_qty('Potato seed')) ? '<col=FF4D4D>Payment: 2 (' + (2 * inv_qty('Potato seed')) + ') Compost</col>' : '<col=55ff55>Payment: 2 (' + (2 * inv_qty('Potato seed')) + ') Compost</col>') : (inv_qty('Compost') < 2 ? '<col=FF4D4D>Payment: 2x Compost</col>' : '<col=55ff55>Payment: 2x Compost</col>')}

${inv_qty('Onion seed') > 1 ? (inv_qty('Potato') < (10 * inv_qty('Onion seed')) ? '<col=FF4D4D>Payment: 10 (' + (10 * inv_qty('Onion seed')) + ') Potato</col>' : '<col=55ff55>Payment: 10 (' + (10 * inv_qty('Onion seed')) + ') Potato</col>') : (inv_qty('Potato') < 10 ? '<col=FF4D4D>Payment: 10x Potato</col>' : '<col=55ff55>Payment: 10x Potato</col>')}

${inv_qty('Cabbage seed') > 1 ? (inv_qty('Onion') < (10 * inv_qty('Cabbage seed')) ? '<col=FF4D4D>Payment: 10 (' + (10 * inv_qty('Cabbage seed')) + ') Onion</col>' : '<col=55ff55>Payment: 10 (' + (10 * inv_qty('Cabbage seed')) + ') Onion</col>') : (inv_qty('Onion') < 10 ? '<col=FF4D4D>Payment: 10x Onion</col>' : '<col=55ff55>Payment: 10x Onion</col>')}

${inv_qty('Tomato seed') > 1 ? (inv_qty('Cabbage') < (10 * inv_qty('Tomato seed')) ? '<col=FF4D4D>Payment: 10 (' + (10 * inv_qty('Tomato seed')) + ') Cabbage</col>' : '<col=55ff55>Payment: 10 (' + (10 * inv_qty('Tomato seed')) + ') Cabbage</col>') : (inv_qty('Cabbage') < 10 ? '<col=FF4D4D>Payment: 10x Cabbage</col>' : '<col=55ff55>Payment: 10x Cabbage</col>')}

${inv_qty('Sweetcorn seed') > 1 ? (inv_qty('Jute fibre') < (10 * inv_qty('Sweetcorn seed')) ? '<col=FF4D4D>Payment: 10 (' + (10 * inv_qty('Sweetcorn seed')) + ') Jute Fibre</col>' : '<col=55ff55>Payment: 10 (' + (10 * inv_qty('Sweetcorn seed')) + ') Jute Fibre</col>') : (inv_qty('Jute fibre') < 10 ? '<col=FF4D4D>Payment: 10x Jute Fibre</col>' : '<col=55ff55>Payment: 10x Jute Fibre</col>')}

${inv_qty('Strawberry seed') > 1 ? (inv_qty('Basket of Apples') < inv_qty('Strawberry seed') ? '<col=FF4D4D>Payment: ' + inv_qty('Strawberry seed') + 'x Apples (5)</col>' : '<col=55ff55>Payment: ' + inv_qty('Strawberry seed') + 'x Apples (5)</col>') : (inv_qty('Basket of Apples') < 1 ? '<col=FF4D4D>Payment: 1x Apples (5)</col>' : '<col=55ff55>Payment: 1x Apples (5)</col>')}

${inv_qty('Watermelon seed') > 1 ? (inv_qty('Curry leaf') < (10 * inv_qty('Watermelon seed')) ? '<col=FF4D4D>Payment: 10 (' + (10 * inv_qty('Watermelon seed')) + ') Curry Leaves</col>' : '<col=55ff55>Payment: 10 (' + (10 * inv_qty('Watermelon seed')) + ') Curry Leaves</col>') : (inv_qty('Curry leaf') < 10 ? '<col=FF4D4D>Payment: 10x Curry Leaves</col>' : '<col=55ff55>Payment: 10x Curry Leaves</col>')}

${inv_qty('Snape grass seed') > 1 ? (inv_qty('Jangerberry') < (5 * inv_qty('Snape grass seed')) ? '<col=FF4D4D>Payment: 5 (' + (5 * inv_qty('Snape grass seed')) + ') Jangerberries</col>' : '<col=55ff55>Payment: 5 (' + (5 * inv_qty('Snape grass seed')) + ') Jangerberries</col>') : (inv_qty('Jangerberry') < 5 ? '<col=FF4D4D>Payment: 5x Jangerberries</col>' : '<col=55ff55>Payment: 5x Jangerberries</col>')}

${inv_qty('Dwellberry seed') > 1 ? (inv_qty('Basket of Strawberries') < 3 ? '<col=FF4D4D>Payment: 3x Strawberries (5)</col>' : '<col=55ff55>Payment: 3x Strawberries (5)</col>') : (inv_qty('Basket of Strawberries') < 1 ? '<col=FF4D4D>Payment: 1x Strawberries (5)</col>' : '<col=55ff55>Payment: 1x Strawberries (5)</col>')}

${inv_qty('Whiteberry seed') > 1 ? (inv_qty('Bittercap mushroom') < 8 ? '<col=FF4D4D>Payment: 8x Bittercap Mushroom</col>' : '<col=55ff55>Payment: 8x Bittercap Mushroom</col>') : (inv_qty('Bittercap mushroom') < 8 ? '<col=FF4D4D>Payment: 8x Bittercap Mushroom</col>' : '<col=55ff55>Payment: 8x Bittercap Mushroom</col>')}

${'<col=FFFF66>Experience: 675 (Check) / 45 (Harvest)' + (inv_qty('Poison ivy seed') > 1 ? ' (' + (inv_qty('Poison ivy seed') * 675) + ' / ' + (inv_qty('Poison ivy seed') * 45) + ')' : '') + '</col>'}
${inv_qty('Bittercap mushroom spore') > 1 ? '<col=FFFF66>Experience: 57 (' + (inv_qty('Bittercap mushroom spore') * 57) + ')</col>' : '<col=FFFF66>Experience: 57 per mushroom</col>'}

${inv_qty('Potato cactus seed') > 1 ? '<col=FFFF66>Experience: 68 (' + (inv_qty('Potato cactus seed') * 68) + ') (plant) / 230 (' + (inv_qty('Potato cactus seed') * 230) + ') (check) / 68 (' + (inv_qty('Potato cactus seed') * 68) + ') (harvest)</col>' : '<col=FFFF66>Experience: 68 (plant) / 230 (check) / 68 (harvest)</col>'}
